  • Home

moth: vulnerable web application

A set of vulnerable scripts which can be used for testing web application security scanners, teaching web application security, etc.

This is a rewrite of the PHP-based moth web application.

Vulnerabilities

This software has numerous vulnerabilities, which are grouped according to the w3af plugin which identifies them:

  • Audit
  • Auth
  • Bruteforce
  • Core
  • Crawl
  • Grep
  • Infrastructure

This software should never be used in a production environment.

Moth, from the creators of w3af .

item.response:
HTTP/1.1 404 NOT FOUND Date: Wed, 24 Jun 2015 11:47:10 GMT Content-Type: text/html Server: TwistedWeb/14.0.0 Content-Length: 1583 Page not found at /favicon.ico

Page not found (404)

Request Method: GET
Request URL: http://127.0.0.1:8000/favicon.ico

You're seeing this error because you have DEBUG = True in your Django settings file. Change that to False, and Django will display a standard 404 page.

Audit plugin family test suite

    blind_sqli
  • Trivial Blind SQL injection WHERE integer query-string
  • Trivial Blind SQL injection WHERE string single-quote query-string
  • Trivial blind SQL injection in form WHERE integer form blind
  • Trivial blind SQL injection in form with GET method WHERE integer form blind GET

    • eval_vuln
  • Python eval() vulnerability GET blind
  • Python execute vulnerability GET execute -c double-quote
  • Python execute vulnerability GET execute -c single-quote

    • global_redirect
  • 302 HTTP response code redirect
  • 302 HTTP response code redirect (filtered)
  • 302 HTTP response code redirect with redirect header
  • False positive check for global redirect
  • JavaScript redirect
  • meta tag redirect

    • local_file_read
  • Arbitrary local file read trivial GET
  • Arbitrary local file read with extension appended GET
  • Echo /etc/passwd file GET
  • Full path arbitrary file read trivial GET

    • memcache_injection
  • Batch injection memcache memcached injection
  • Batch injection(internal test version) memcache memcached injection

    • os_commanding
  • Blind OS Commanding blind GET
  • OS Commanding in command argument argument GET
  • Trivial OS Commanding trivial GET

    • phishing_vector
  • Frame tag phishing vector (trivial)
  • Iframe tag phishing vector (trivial)
  • Iframe tag phishing vector with filter

    • sql_injection
  • Trivial SQL injection WHERE integer form
  • Trivial SQL injection WHERE integer query-string
  • Trivial SQL injection WHERE string single-quote query-string

    • ssrf
  • Authenticated SSRF test POST SSRF
  • Logout the current session
  • SSRF launchpad trivial GET

    • xpath
  • XPath false positive check trivial GET xss
  • XPath false positive check trivial GET empty
  • XPath injection in OR query POST or
  • XPath injection in double quoted string POST double-quote
  • XPath injection in single quoted string POST single-quote
  • XPath injection in tag section of query POST tag

    • xss
  • (almost) Cross-Site Scripting false-positive GET filtered
  • .lower() Cross-Site scripting .lower() GET
  • Cross-Site scripting trivial GET
  • Cross-Site scripting in form trivial POST persistent
  • Cross-Site scripting in form trivial POST
  • Cross-Site scripting in form using GET method trivial GET
  • Cross-Site scripting in form with two inputs POST
  • Cross-Site scripting in multipart/post form multipart POST
  • Cross-Site scripting with CSP enabled CSP GET
  • Cross-Site scripting with trivial blacklist filter trivial GET blacklist
  • Cross-Site scripting with trivial blacklist filter trivial GET blacklist
  • Cross-Site scripting with weak CSP CSP GET
